description: A protocol contains information about the intended protocol that was followed in the project.
title: protocol_core

protocol_id.description: A unique ID for this protocol.

protocol_name.description: A short, descriptive name for the protocol that need not be unique.

protocol_description.description: A general description of the protocol.

doi.description: The publication digital object identifier (doi), if available. e.g. "10.1016/j.cell.2016.07.054"

pdf.description: A filename of a PDF containing the details of the protocol.

retail_name.description: The retail name of the kit used. e.g SureCell WTA 3' Library Prep Kit

protocol_type.description: The type of protocol. Ideally an EFO term.
